Test http://www.w3.org/2001/DOM-Test-Suite/level3/core/nodeinsertbefore04

<test name='nodeinsertbefore04' schemaLocation='http://www.w3.org/2001/DOM-Test-Suite/Level-3 dom3.xsd'>
     <metadata>
          <title>nodeinsertbefore04</title>
          <creator>IBM</creator>
          <description> Using insertBefore on this Document node attempt to insert this Document node before this DocumentType node and verify if a HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR is raised. </description>
          <contributor>Neil Delima</contributor>
          <date qualifier='created'>2002-06-10</date>
          <subject resource='http://www.w3.org/TR/2004/REC-DOM-Level-3-Core-20040407/core#ID-952280727'/>
</metadata>
     <var name='doc' type='Document'/>
     <var name='docType' type='DocumentType'/>
     <var name='inserted' type='Node'/>
     <load var='doc' href='hc_staff' willBeModified='true'/>
     <doctype var='docType' obj='doc'/>
     <assertDOMException id='throw_HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR'>
          <HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR>
               <insertBefore obj='doc' var='inserted' newChild='doc' refChild='docType'/>
          </HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR>
     </assertDOMException>
</test>
